POST /api/topics: adds a topic to topics database
POST /api/users: adds a user to users database
GET /api/users/:username: selects a user by its username
POST /api/articles: adds an article to articles database
PATCH /api/articles/:article_id: updates the votes of article by its id
GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: selects  comments by article id /query available
POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments: adds a comment to an article by its id
DELETE /api/articles/:article_id/comment: removes a comment from an article by its id
PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id: updates the vote count of a comment by id
